stockd.ta.sma



class Sma;
Simple moving average computed over a specified period of time

this(ushort period = 12);
Params:
ushort period period SMA is calculated for

double add(double value);
Evaluate next value

static void evaluate(ref const double[] input, ushort period, ref double[] output);
Evaluate SMA for the whole input array
